document.full_text: lowry's lonely people, tracey emin's scrawlings and a mysterious portrait of elizabeth i are just a few of the gems from the british government's art collection unveiled to the public for the first time this week.
document.title: britain unveils historic and hip government art
lines_and_colors: lowry's lonely people, tracey emin's scrawlings and a mysterious portrait of elizabeth i are just a few of the gems from the british government's art collection unveiled to the public for the first time this week.
